instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-2936 low install macOS
threads.message: Good morning, I have a MacBook pro that when installing the High Sierra system presents an installation time of 4 hrs or more, on other mac this does not happen. I cleaned the Me Bios Region, but it had no effect, I would like to know if there is any component that can cause this?

threads.title: 820-2936 low install macOS
threads.message:
Did you clean ME region correctly?
Try PC3-10600, as PC3-8500 RAM too.
Run ASD and see if any error pops up.

threads.title: 820-2936 low install macOS
threads.message: I put memories that work, bus 1333, but when I choose the SSD to install the system, the time estimate is 4 hours, and every time it does not install. You accepted macOS El Capitan.

threads.title: 820-2936 low install macOS
threads.message:
Run ASD EFI and see if any error pops up.

The machine works good with El Capitan?

threads.title: 820-2936 low install macOS
threads.message:
[QUOTE="2informaticos, post: 69454, member: 682"]
The machine works good with El Capitan
[/QUOTE]
yes, works

threads.title: 820-2936 low install macOS
threads.message: Did you try ugrading from El Capitan, instead of new installation?
